messages.subject: Re: Radical unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: ... he ... almost ... a ... Nancy Thankyou ! Marianne
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com, marbleface@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 09/12/2000 7:08:11 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
> tonitoni@z... writes:
>
> <<
> My grandson was not the vibrant - fun loving - happy - pied piper
he
> is at home. He sat there (even before he saw me) very subdue,
almost
> in fear.
> I wanted to run to my daughter - in - law and say "HOMESCHOOL _
> HOMESCHOOL.before school robs him of his identity." And this from
a
> VERY new Homeschooler.......
> Marianne >>
>
>
> Well, at least he has a cool Gramma!
>
> Nance

Nancy

"Thankyou"!

Marianne

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Radical unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/12/2000 7:08:11 PM !!!First Boot!!!, tonitoni@zfree.co.nz writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/12/2000 7:08:11 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
tonitoni@... writes:

<<
My grandson was not the vibrant - fun loving - happy - pied piper he
is at home. He sat there (even before he saw me) very subdue, almost
in fear.
I wanted to run to my daughter - in - law and say "HOMESCHOOL _
HOMESCHOOL.before school robs him of his identity." And this from a
VERY new Homeschooler.......
Marianne >>


Well, at least he has a cool Gramma!

Nance
